Powers.DescShort: PBAoE, High DMG(Cold), Foe Terrorize, Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed
Powers.DescLong: The Dire Wolf is capable of letting out a Terrible Roar that will cause High Cold damage, slow and terrorize all nearby foes for a short time. Recharge: Long
This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.

When the Dire Wolf is dangerously low on health it will become enraged and suffer significantly less damage for a short time as well as recovering a portion of its health. Once this power wears off it will leave it partially drained of endurance.  Recharge: Very Long
